textBeforeTable: More Questions from This Game }); $(this).replaceWith(' Your Message:'); $('textarea[name="clarify_message"],input[name="clarify_submit"]').show(); $('input[name="clarify"]').click(function(){ $('textarea[name="clarify_message"],input[name="clarify_submit"]').hide(); } } voted[message_id] = 1; document.getElementById('m' + message_id).className = 'rating_on ' + type; document.getElementById(message_id + type).innerHTML = cur_vote + 1; ajax("/features/qna/vote.php", "vote=" + type + "&key=72e8f8d0&qid=241035&mid=" + message_id, no_response); { if(voted[message_id]!=1) { function vote(message_id, cur_vote, type) var voted = []; This question has been successfully answered and closed After the second sequence you should recieve an e-mail that gives you the passwords from a mailer address other than the three characters in the system. 5 years ago 0 0 Darkmoon06 answered: Accepted Answer I've found that in the out of Animus sessions, Desmond can answer the email on the computer. But it shows the other accounts of the other characters, and you can try to log in to no avail? Does he ever get the passwords and can snoop around, or not? If not, why the hell did they put that in the first place? 5 years ago What is with the email?
